homeHero.heroText1: Digital parking disc - directly on your mobile.
homeHero.heroText2: A winning concept in a new, digitalized format.

WhyParkingTime.avoidFinesDes: Our digital solution attracts more visitors by eliminating physical discs and reducing fines. This simplifies parking, boosts foot traffic, economic activity and city vibrancy  while reducing stress.
WhyParkingTime.simplifiedDes: Our app lets you effortlessly set, adjust, and monitor parking time. With a user-friendly interface, you can quickly find spots and manage parking. We continuously update based on customer feedback to ensure an efficient and hassle-free experience.
WhyParkingTime.integrationDes: Our system for parking attendants integrates seamlessly with your existing setup. A unified system benefits you by streamlining operations and enhancing the experience for personnel by eliminating the need for two different systems and devices. We make this integration efficient, intuitive, and simple!
WhyParkingTime.dataDes: The digital parking disc can eventually optimize parking resources and urban planning through valuable usage data and behavior patterns, leading to a safer society with better control and access to parking spaces.

aboutHero.headline: Parking Time Sweden
aboutHero.heroText: We are a tech startup dedicated to transforming the parking experience for all stakeholders â€“ parkers, parking attendants, municipalities, and property owners.

contactHero.headline: We would love to hear from you!

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.headline: Do you have a question?
FAQ.subheadline: Here are some common questions answered
FAQ.q2: How do I use Parking Time?
FAQ.q4: How do I get it in my municipality?
FAQ.answer1: Parking Time is a free to download app that works as a digital parking disc, you just start parking through the app and parking attendants can view how long your session has lasted.
FAQ.answer2-2: and then open it, register with your cars registration number. Use the map, search function, or zone list to find your desired parking location. Once you select your parking zone, you can review any applicable rules, start parking, and then simply close the app.
FAQ.answer3: Parking Time is free to download, but can only be used in a municipality that is a registered customer of Parking Time Sweden.
FAQ.answer4: You can contact your municipality and ask if Parking Time can be implemented.
FAQ.subheadline2: Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
